content.string:
An update to No More Room in Hell has been released. The update will be applied automatically when you restart No More Room in Hell. The major changes include:
[h2]Source Engine upgrade[/h2] [list] [*]Added 64-bit support, 64-bit binaries will automatically be launched on systems with a 64-bit OS [*]Added a borderless window option to video settings [*]Added bicubic lightmaps (from Half-Life 2: 20th Anniversary Update) [*]Added radial fog (from Half-Life 2: 20th Anniversary Update) [*]Added Steam Networking, port forwarding is no longer required [*]Added UI scaling for high-resolution screens [*]Fixed a prediction bug where if the player was moved on the client, their input-based movement for that tick was not taken into account in non-player actions [*]Fixed an issue where certain variables like position would not be updated correctly to match the server in certain situations [*]Fixed certain breakable props not gibbing correctly [*]Fixed player hull being mis-predicted in certain instances causing rollbacks every frame when e.g. crouching or against a wall [*]Fixed the player's base velocity (e.g. conveyors, moving items etc.) getting subtly out of sync from client/server [*]Improved networking precision for local player positions, resulting in less prediction errors and better game-feel [*]Improved prediction for walking on props and other entities [*]Made the game launch in native resolution by default instead of 640x480 [/list] [h2]Additions[/h2] [list] [*]Added a menu in the Create Server dialog that selects a server type for Steam Networking, allowing public / friends-only / unlisted servers without port forwarding [*]Added ability to pause the game when playing in Single Player mode [*]Added cvar "cl_allow_particle_precipitation", when off, it converts particle rain/snow to default variants on maps that use them [/list] [h2]Changes[/h2] [list] [*]Certain HUD elements such as player names are now hidden during suicide blackout [*]ConVar "viewmodel_fov" is now saved to user config [*]Flashlight shadows are now independent from "High" shadow quality, and can be enabled in the advanced options (off by default to reduce engine crashes) [*]Optimized network bandwidth on player and zombie movement [*]Optimized zombie performance even further on crowded maps [*]Revised voice status icons over player heads to be more readable in darker maps [*]Updated the localization files: [list]
[*]With thanks to community translators: [b]Atheist, Klowby, MakinDay, marcielcps, Plazehorta, RicecakeHuman[/b] [*]Want to localize NMRiH to your own language? [url=https://github.com/nmrih/nmrih-localization-files]Visit our localization repository on GitHub.[/url] [/list] [/list] [h2]Fixes[/h2] [list] [*]Fixed ironsights not being turned off when contemplating suicide [*]Fixed particle rain collision, contributed by BigHatMarley (#1579) [*]Fixed zombie idle vocalization cutting short on longer moans [/list] [h2]Changes for mappers and modders[/h2] [list] [*]Added custom zombie model pools, which can be controlled by cvars prefixed with "sv_zombie_models" [*]Added "ent_minsmaxs" command, prints entity bounding box in a MapHack friendly format [*]Added entity "npc_nmrih_basezombie", base class for a generic zombie, useful for custom zombies [*]Added entity "skybox_swapper", swaps 2D skybox material [*]Added "HeadSplit" input for zombies (#1569) [*]Added hull override keyfield to zombies [*]Added input "RevertAllMapCvars" to entity "logic_ruleset", it reverts all cvars that were changed by an active map to a base value (when available), or default, it doesn't revert difficulty / script / mutator changes [*]Added keyfield "Despawn Ignore Population" to entity "func_zombie_spawn", by default, zombies only despawn when zone population is over the maximum, even when they're unseen; when set to 'No', it uses classic behavior where visited zones keep max. zombies, when set to 'Yes', it always despawns unseen zombies [*]Added keyfield "Ignore Zombie Rules" to zombies, when true, game rules will treat them as a generic NPC [*]Added line break support to entity "point_message_multiplayer" [*]Added missing spawnflags to entity "point_viewcontrol_multiplayer" [*]Added outputs "OnBarricade" and "OnBreak" to entity "nmrih_barricade" [*]Added support for barricade prop model override [*]Added support for filtering model rendering on specific clients [*]Fixed dynamic "logic_progress" always completing on "StopProgress" [*]Fixed entity "logic_script_proxy" calls not working on global scope when using instances [*]Fixed entity "logic_script_proxy" not accepting null for input "SetTargetEntity" [*]Fixed parented model attachments on NPCs being misaligned [*]Fixed runners spawned via BecomeRunner not randomizing their collision groups [*]Fixed sparks sound on buttons not playing [*]FGD: Customized "base.fgd" is now shipped with "nmrih.fgd", to replace class overrides and dependency for base SDK [*]MapHack: Fixed collision bounds on spawned brush entities [*]VScript: Added CBaseAnimating functions SetPlayerDrawFilter(), and DrawFilterAllPlayers(), when set to true, this model won't be visible for the given player [*]VScript: Added CBaseEntity hook OnTakeDamage, this hook is designed as a mutable replacement for filter_script's PassesFinalDamageFilter, incoming damage info can be modified before it's applied, returning 'false' will discard received damage [*]VScript: Added CNMRiH_BarricadePoint function SetModelOverride() [*]VScript: Added CNMRiH_Player function DidGunshotSuicide() [*]VScript: Added CNMRiH_Player hooks OnWeaponDrop, OnWeaponEquip, and OnWeaponSwitch [*]VScript: Added consistent rand() and RAND_MAX across platforms [*]VScript: Added constants for NMRiH button masks, collision groups, and damage types [*]VScript: Added CScriptNavArea functions GetAdjacentAreas(), and GetAdjacentCount() [*]VScript: Added functions TraceEntity(), and TraceHull() [*]VScript: Added support for trace filter hit entity callbacks on TraceLineEx(), TraceHull(), and TraceEntity(), via "callback" value that expects a function with single argument for params, e.g. "function ShouldHitEntity(params)" where 'params' have keys: entity, contentsmask; returned value filters the hit entity [*]VScript: Class CScriptNavArea now has string representation (i.e. "[<ID>] Area") [*]VScript: Fixed CNMRiH_Player function IsTalkingWalkie() always returning 'false' [*]VScript: Fixed crash when passing null values to TraceLineEx() function [*]VScript: Fixed function SetActivity() allowing ACT_INVALID, which caused a crash [*]VScript: Fixed hooks NPC_TranslateActivity and NPC_TranslateSchedule not checking invalid return types [/list] [h2]Changes for server admins[/h2] [list] [*]Added ability to modify zombie model pools, controlled by cvars "sv_zombie_models", "sv_zombie_models_kid", "sv_zombie_models_ng", and "sv_zombie_models_runner", models are set with ',' delimiter relative to models/nmr_zombie/*.mdl (or direct filename) [*]Added cvar "ov_despawn_ignore_population", by default zombies only despawn when zone population is over the maximum, set to 0 for vanilla behavior where visited zones keep max. zombies, or 1 that always despawns unseen zombies (#1562) [*]Added cvar "sv_runner_randomize_collision_group", runners always switch collision groups (grease) on spawn, when 0 and paired with BecomeRunner, this emulates bugged behavior pre-v1.15.0 [*]Added cvar "sv_zombie_brainstem_dmg_scale", zombies take this factor of brainstem hitbox damage (if sv_brainstem is set to 1) [*]Added cvars to tweak zombie vocalization, "sv_zombie_moan_freq_angry_only", "sv_zombie_moan_freq_limit", and "sv_zombie_moan_freq_random" (vanilla behavior unchanged) [*]Added new method of randomizing zombie models by shuffling a model pool and pulling entries from it, this can be controlled with cvar "sv_zombie_shuffle_models" [*]Game state commands (such as "respawnplayer") now support SteamIDs and partial name matches as arguments [/list] [h1]Maps[/h1]
[h3]nmo_asylum[/h3] [list] [*]Fixed leg part softlock (#1565) [*]Fixed weird glitch artifact on a ceiling brush [/list] [h3]nmo_broadway2[/h3] [list] [*]Added clips for smooth movement in the last ladder extraction area [*]Tweaked escape rope "ladder" brush to be less confusing (#1533) [/list] [h3]nmo_cabin[/h3] [list] [*]Reduced damage time from the canister explosion [/list] [h3]nmo_chinatown[/h3] [list] [*]Fixed fade distance value being too close on a Gun Shop extinguisher prop [/list] [h3]nmo_cleopas[/h3] [list] [*]Added glow for lever base [*]Added power box prop in one of the houses to hide a seeping tree through a wall [*]Fixed softlock when lever is dropped into the electric puddle (#1537) [*]Fixed softlock when objective items are thrown out of reach (#1548) [/list] [h3]nmo_quarantine[/h3] [list] [*]Fixed barricade spots at the end of the map not working (#1561) [/list] [h3]nmo_toxteth / nmo_toxtethdark[/h3] [list] [*]Fixed missing X mark on the brick cemetery wall [/list] [h3]nms_arpley[/h3] [list] [*]Fixed fade distance value on some props in the house being too close [/list] [h3]nms_northway[/h3] [list] [*]Fixed fade distance value on extinguisher prop being too close [/list]
Featuring 64-bit support, Steam Networking, latest Source Engine, and more!
No more port forwarding! Create your public and friends-only games effortlessly with Steam Networking, while taking advantage of the latest Source Engine features.
